thread.title: BREAKING: Status Orange snow-ice warning for Kilkenny, with 'significant snowfall' expected
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Status Orange snow-ice warning for Kilkenny, with 'significant snowfall' expected

author: Reporter
title: BREAKING: Status Orange snow-ice warning for Kilkenny, with 'significant snowfall' expected
text:
Picture: Met Éireann
A 'Status Orange' snow-ice warning has been issued for [Kilkenny](https://www.kilkennypeople.ie/), Carlow, Kilkenny, Wicklow, Clare, Limerick and Tipperary.
Met Éireann are warning that 'significant snowfall accumulations' are expected.
They are also warning of potential impacts such as very difficult travelling conditions, poor visibility, travel disruption delays to public transport likely (air, rail, bus), difficult conditions underfoot and animal welfare issues.
READ ALSO: [Kilkenny property designed by internationally renowned bio-architect for sale](https://www.kilkennypeople.ie/news/property/1693067/kilkenny-property-designed-by-internationally-renowned-bio-architect-for-sale.html)
The warning comes into effect from 5pm Saturday and is valid until 5pm Sunday.
